base.string: - You should create app on [Spotify Developer Dashboard](https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard/applications). - Tick `Web API` checkbox. | Option | Value | | ------------- | ------------- | | App name | *Anything* | | App description | *Anything* | | Redirect URIs | http://127.0.0.1:44444/ | | Which API/SDKs are you planning to use? | Web API |

- You should create project on [Google Dashboard](https://console.cloud.google.com). - Create OAuth 2.0 Client IDs on [Credentials page](https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials) and pick `"TVs and Limited Input devices"`. - Add yourself on [Audience page](https://console.cloud.google.com/auth/audience) to test users.
